title: Help! I'm On Fire!

fields.name: Curse:
fields.value:
- At the end of each of your turns, a random non-<:inferno:1118594776716021780> card in your hand will have the <:inferno:1118594776716021780> color added, along with the attribute: "May be played if your hand does not have any copy of 2346."
- You cannot play <:inferno:1118594776716021780> cards while you hold 2346.

desc:
Post 2346
This may be played if every card in your hand has the <:inferno:1118594776716021780> color. However, playing this card under such conditions will cause you to double your hand size with <:inferno:1118594776716021780> card draws.
